div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.div: Stay Informed: Subscribe to District updates sent directly to your email inbox. You can subscribe to updates from our Board of School Directors, athletic department, alumni, weather alerts, and community events!

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

p.span: Governor Tom Wolf and Secretary of Health Dr. Rachel Levine announced all 67 Pennsylvania counties will be under stay-at-home orders effective as of Wednesday, April 1, at 8 p.m. The statewide stay-at-home order will continue until April 30. All Pennsylvania schools will remain closed until further notice and non-life-sustaining business closures remain in effect.

In effort to slow the spread of coronavirus (COVID-19) and encourage social distancing, effectively immediately, all Pottsgrove School District playgrounds, fields, tracks and athletic courts are CLOSED until further notice.

a.title: Go to comments for Community Areas Closed

div.span: The mission of the Pottsgrove School District is to educate and inspire all students to excel as productive, responsible citizens, and lifelong learners.

span.em: PGSD is committed to ensuring that all material on its website is accessible to students, faculty, staff and the general public. If you experience difficulty with the accessibility of any web pages or documents, please request materials in an alternate format.
PGSD cannot be responsible for the content or accuracy of external link sites referenced on the District's web pages. External links sites are not supervised by or within the control of the PGSD.
